name: Crush the Monsters: Foul Puzzle
summary: Make mincemeat out of monsters! In this action puzzle game, you can destroy a variety of monsters in many different ways — blow them up with cannon fire, incinerate them, smash them, chop, saw or tear them to pieces (and that’s not nearly all!) And if regular monsters are too simple for your tastes, test your mettle against the epic bosses of the Underworld!
